channel.title: Panic PvP V1 - 718/728
channel.description:
[center]Hey all, As we are working on V2 now it's time to release V1 :)[/center] [center]This server had around 38 players a day.[/center] [center]For everyone who thinks this is leached. It isn't.[/center]
[center]Features[/center] [center]Squeal of Fortune[/center] [center]100% Money Pouch[/center] [center]Clue Scrolls[/center] [center]Pk/Eco[/center] [center]Working PkP Point system with 2 PkP shops[/center] [center]Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats[/center] [center]Commands for spellbooks, altar for curses 100% Dicing ( Clan )[/center]
[center]
Npc's
King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks Full Nex with all 4 stages Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers ) Corporeal beast Frost dragons Dominion Tower [/center]
[center]Custom Donator Zone Halloween Event ( created by me ) Started on Christmas event ( check the dialouges )[/center]
[center]And much more, find out by yourself.[/center]
[center]Pictures[/center]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/xcsqwj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/qyu71k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/jpzpzl.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2vkg6t4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/i2omck.jpg[/img]
[center] Source download: http://uppit.com/lnf8k4mcqy1f/Panic_Release.rar Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?39329305qzk2xtz Cache: http://uppit.com/n1ixd84i1io1/cache.zip
Credits
Matrix Team Me Panic

item.title: Panic PvP V1 - 718/728
item.dc:creator: @Mconi3 Mconi3
item.description:
@Mconi3 wrote:

[quote=“Junes, post:114, topic:469778”]can someone help me please, i seem to be having a client issue (could be wrong but it’s my guess) anywho i’m effectively a noob especially when it comes to 718/728 (tinkered with 317’s for a lil bit then took a couple of a years break) i am getting this error when i goto create a character the client freezes and then absolutely sod all happens… lol. there is no error in my server run bat so i would presume it is a client issue, and even on the old school private servers i didn’t really touch that side so i am in no luck to draw from past experience… i have done a quick search (maybe not hard enough) but if someone could point me in the right direction it would be much appreciated no need to spoon feed if it can be helped i do like to learn when it comes to errors

This is the error that is thrown at me:

Error: vn.n() client.er() | Class288_Sub1.method2730:87 client.method2806:3720 c lient.method2773:641 Class291.method2764:641 Class291.method2759:457 Class291.ru n:384 java.lang.Thread.run | item.title: Panic PvP V1 - 718/728
item.dc:creator: @frostypanda frostypanda
item.description:
@frostypanda wrote:

[quote=“vpur3v, post:107, topic:469778”]http://gyazo.com/64dfc7fa67c59bdce0819ae036419f3f

Need help with this ima newbie lol :|[/quote]

This is an easy fix man
so just one read the error think about it think real hard then keep reading and hopefully learn something
exception… think… so the 2nd line means a file is missing data/cache/main_file_c maybe you should make one? so this is the easy part
do yo data make a folder called cache http://prntscr.com/1luxbl … now here comes the really hard part man open it… make a folder name it main_file_c yay good job almost done hope you are following along easy if not stop right now and go home you have downs so after you have made Main_file_c look for the cache you downloaded extract to the folder cache makes sence right? then this is something i did to be safe because i didnt know how to do this until i started to read the error… extract cache to main_file_c and there ya go easy fix if it doesnt work you fucked up and should probably not make a server have nice day read more and drink milk

Read full topic
